transcript.text: shabbat shalom everybody I've literally
had hundreds of followers of the sick
and twisted dug Hagman from the Hackman
and Hagman report spam my comments on my
youtube telling me that Doug Hagman is
gonna sue me because I've accused him of
being a Jesuit now Doug Hagman please
sue me in fact I'll make it easy for you
I'll actually give you my physical
address so you'll know exactly where
your lawyers can serve me I want you to
sue me now I'm going to post a link
below this video it says is Doug Hagman
part of the Jesuit World Order and
therefore a controlled opposition
Vatican coadjutor coadjutor Doug Hagman
tells Greg Jackson while during a
commercial break having graduated from a
minor seminary a Roman Catholic seminary
a Jesuit seminary this is at the 5
minute and 30 second mark I will post
this video Doug Hagman from his own
mouth confesses that he graduated from a
Jesuit controlled seminary the Jesuits
are the military arm of the satanic
pedophile Vatican Doug Hagman you want
to sue me you want to take me to court
let's do it you might as well sue fiona
as well and also make sure you sue this
video that says Hagman and Hagman
exposed with greg jackson this was put
up by let's see let me give you the
YouTube Pete Bowl put up by Inquisition
news back on September 4th 2015 so sue
Fiona Barnet sue Inquisition news and
sue me by all means we will take you to
court and the media will have a field
day as we expose you for the Jesuit that
you are working for a satanic pedophile
promoting Vatican you see the thing is
what my trolls don't understand
well my enemies don't understand is when
Yahshua commissioned me to start
exposing satanic pedophiles and those
who are covering for satanic pedophiles
protecting them
looking for them but as long as I
continue on this mission
Yas gonna protect me every single troll
that I said Oh Daniel you've crossed the
line they've been sentenced for a year
now you've crossed the line your YouTube
channels over you're going to jail
blah blah blah every time I get more
subscribers my channel gets lifted up as
Psalm 92 says he lifts up my horn not
because of me but because Jesus Christ
of Nazareth who lives within me and
lives within any believer so like waves
crashing against the rocky beachhead
these frothing at the mouth followers of
Doug Hagman will once again break on the
beachhead into nothing as yah Yahshua
HaMashiach the rock protects me for I am
a blood bot blood wash driven to the
messiah i declare this now on shabbat
shalom
Doug Hagman come on be the latest one to
try to attack me and you'll find but not
only will you fail in every effort to
attack me but the very pit you seek to
dig for me you will fall on yourself
your days are over Doug Hagman you
cannot continue to deceive the masses
you graduated because you confess with
your own mouth in 2015 you graduated
from a Jesuit seminary the Jesuits are
the military arm of the satanic
pedophile Vatican your days of deceiving
the masses are over shabbat shalom
